CYBERPUNK

Neon Nights: Underworld Chronicles

In the grim underbelly of Night City, a new chapter unfolds. "Neon Nights: Underworld Chronicles" takes players on a thrilling journey through the shadowy world of organized crime. As V navigates the neon-lit streets once more, they stumble upon a web of intrigue and power struggles that threaten to reshape the city's criminal landscape. The DLC plunges players into a multi-faceted narrative, filled with deception, double-crosses, and dangerous alliances.

Gangs Reimagined

Three new factions have risen to prominence, each with its own unique criminal enterprises. From the enigmatic technomancers of the Binary Serpents to the ruthless mercenary syndicate known as Bloodhawks, players must navigate these treacherous waters. Choose your alliances wisely, as your decisions will shape the future of Night City.

Heists and Score

Engage in high-stakes heists, infiltrate secure corporate facilities, and mastermind daring getaways. Plan meticulously or go in guns blazing - the choice is yours. Every job brings fresh challenges and opportunities, from hacking megacorp databases to hijacking AV transports carrying valuable contraband.

New Cyberware and Weapons

Outfit V with cutting-edge cyberware and armaments. Unleash the power of the "Ghostweaver" cloaking implant, turning V invisible for a limited time, or wield the "Monarch" energy whip for electrifying melee combat. Choose from a range of deadly firearms, including the iconic "Bloodhawk P9000."

Night City at Night

Experience Night City in a new light, as the DLC introduces dynamic day-night cycles. Neon lights shimmer against rain-soaked streets, creating a stunning visual backdrop for your criminal exploits.

NEW EVENTS
